name: ReFrog
description:
An isometric version of the classic game Frogger but with the twist of having to collect physics-based slices of cake to earn points (as well as still getting to the end of the level). Some objects and tiles can interact with each other but I don't think it's complicated enough to require explanation.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Hold shift to move half a tile instead of a full tile.

R to restart.

E is a cheat-button that lets you jump to the end of the level.

Credits:

Michael Stout

Ignotas Burba

Ishaq Olah

Luke Mitchell
